p: The hydrothermal synthesis of Nb 2O 5 is based on the decomposition of niobium peroxo species formed by the reaction of ammonium niobium(V) oxalate and hydrogen peroxide. CAUTION: As the hydrothermal synthesis is performed in a closed stainless-steel vessel, it is mandatory to check if the vessel is rated to operate under the pressure built by the decomposition of the full content of hydrogen peroxide employed in the synthesis.
